::Zardus::

Zardus leans forward in his command chair as the Alliance base recieves 
Panzertron's message.

"Interesting...." Zardus says to himlelf before activating his comm-link.

"Welcome to earth," he says as a way of introduction, sending the 
transmission to the new ship, "This is Zardus, commander of the Alliance."
